sentence.text: A 30 to 45% increase in AUC and Cmax of nisoldipine was observed with concomitant administration of cimetidine 400 mg twice daily.
Ranitidine 150 mg twice daily did not interact significantly with nisoldipine (AUC was decreased by 15-20 %).
sentence.negationtags: Ranitidine 150 mg twice daily did <xcope><cue>not</cue> interact significantly with nisoldipine (AUC was decreased by 15-20 %)</xcope>.

sentence.text: No pharmacodynamic effects of either histamine H2 receptor antagonist were observed.
sentence.negationtags: <xcope><cue>No</cue> pharmacodynamic effects of either histamine H2 receptor antagonist were observed</xcope>.

sentence.text: Coadministration of phenytoin with 40 mg SULAR tablets in epileptic patients lowered the nisoldipine plasma concentrations to undetectable levels.
Coadministration of SULAR with phenytoin or any known CYP3A4 inducer should be avoided and alternative antihypertensive therapy should be considered.
Pharmacokinetic interactions between nisoldipine and beta-blockers (atenolol, propranolol) were variable and not significant.
sentence.negationtags: Pharmacokinetic interactions between nisoldipine and beta-blockers (atenolol, propranolol) were variable and <xcope><cue>not</cue> significant</xcope>.

sentence.text: Propranolol attenuated the heart rate increase following administration of immediate release nisoldipine.
The blood pressure effect of SULAR tended to be greater in patients on atenolol than in patients on no other antihypertensive therapy.
sentence.negationtags: The blood pressure effect of SULAR tended to be greater in patients on atenolol than in patients on <xcope><cue>no</cue> other antihypertensive therapy</xcope>.

sentence.text: Quinidine at 648 mg bid decreased the bioavailability (AUC) of nisoldipine by 26%, but not the peak concentration.
sentence.negationtags: Quinidine at 648 mg bid decreased the bioavailability (AUC) of nisoldipine by 26%, but <xcope><cue>not</cue> the peak concentration</xcope>.

sentence.text: The immediate release, but not the coat-core formulation of nisoldipine increased plasma quinidine concentrations by about 20%.
sentence.negationtags: The immediate release, but <xcope><cue>not</cue> the coat-core formulation of nisoldipine increased plasma quinidine concentrations by about 20%</xcope>.

sentence.text: This interaction was not accompanied by ECG changes and its clinical significance is not known.
sentence.negationtags: <xcope>This interaction was <cue>not</cue> accompanied by ECG changes and its clinical significance</xcope> is <xcope><cue>not</cue> known</xcope>.

sentence.text: No significant interactions were found between nisoldipine and warfarin or digoxin.
sentence.negationtags: <xcope><cue>No</cue> significant interactions were found between nisoldipine and warfarin or digoxin</xcope>.
